title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.31 - Corrosive liquids referenced to this section
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.31 - Corrosive liquids referenced to this section

State Regulations

Corrosive liquids listed in section
1211.150
for reference to this
section are restricted to a maximum quantity per vehicle of 100 pounds gross
weight provided, however, such liquid is in cylinders of 20 pounds gross weight
or less. There are no restrictions on the transport of empty containers which
last contained such corrosive liquid provided the accompanying shipping papers
show them to be empty. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1211.31

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
